name: Two Gears
description:
Puzzle game with 5 levels, you have 2 robots and you can controll them changing the POV, one of them is a little robot that can jump and the other is a big one that can grab boxes and the scientist.

The narrative: You are a scientist and the place where you work come down, you can't move but in the past you made two robots and you need them to exit from the destroyed laboratory.
